extendedInfo.description: "Saving Yello successfully wraps quality graphics and sound, interesting gameplay, varied power-ups, decent game physics and a cute fish into this entertaining fish-flinging game." - TouchArcade.com - âââââ·Save Yello from his out-of-bowl terror! Yello, a helpless goldfish at the mercy of his 7-year-old owner, Mathilda who loves playing with him outside his beloved bowl. You must fling Yello back to safety. Get even and destroy Mathilda's toys along the way! Action packed physics puzzler:â Awesome Physics-based destructionâ Killer power upsâ OpenFeintâ Play 10 cool levels of the first setting for freeâ Unlock the full version including 50 hazardous levels over 3 settingsâ Collect all the stars to enjoy many hours of challenging playtimeVisit our homepage at http://www.dreamfab.com.Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/dreamfab_games or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/dreamfab to get the latest news about our games!Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/dreamfabVideos. Contact us at support@dreamfab.com for any problems you may have with this game.Yeah, Yello is pretty yellow! ;-)One more thing: Chasing Yello is coming soon on Google Play, too!
